entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ToImmutableDictionary for KVP and Tuples #86472
  • [wasm] Perf run failure for AOT : `wasm-validator error in function System_Threading_Channels_System_Collections_Generic_Deque_1_T_GSHAREDVT_get_IsEmpty] unexpected false: local.get index must be small enough` #86471
    8.0.0
  • UnsafeRelaxedJsonEscaping escapes too much #86463
  • ILLink produces invalid IL metadata with -b switch and Save assembly mode #86462
  • Safer failure with COM/C++/vtable interop and RTTI #86458
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: IConfigurationRoot should derive from IDisposable #86456
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add async version of ThreadStart and ParameterizedThreadStart callback #86454
  • Unsafe.BitCast/As does not remove stack spilling for custom SIMD type #86448
  • [browser] configure rollup to minify internal method names #86447
    8.0.0
  • Feature request: treat Memory/ReadOnlyMemory<T> as T[] in System.Text.Json #86442
    Future
  • Process terminated. Infinite recursion during resource lookup within System.Private.CoreLib - Argument_InvalidResourceCultureName #86441
  • Add a `JsonTypeInfoResolver.WithModifier` extension method #86440
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Implement support for `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` #86438
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient returns "System.IO.IOException: The response ended prematurely" when run in a container #86434
  • Exception in Dispose() prevents disposing of all other services #86426
  • HTTPClient throw many System.IO.IOException in .NET6 & .NET7 #86422
  • Improve debugging experience of ClaimsPrincipal #86421
    8.0.0
  • Behavior difference in JsonSerializer between .NET7 and .NET8 p4 #86419
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.EnumConverterTests.NegativeEnumValue_CultureInvariance #86417
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessWaitingTests.WaitChain #86416
    Future

Closed

  • CI failure: Could not find a chrome snapshot #86451
  • Failure when building self-hosted NativeAOT compiler changes with 8.0 Preview 2 SDK #83695
    8.0.0
  • Make call-counting, class probes, block counters cache-friendly #72387
    8.0.0
  • [Breaking change] Changing EventSource OnEventCommand to be consistent #84586
  • Assertion failed in Task.UnsafeSetContinuationForAwait #86444
  • Test Failure - `jit64_do.0.1` #85590
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Math.Clamp<T> #85979
  • Proposal Max, Min for IComparable #18481
    Future
  • ZipFile hangs when encountering named pipe #85097
  • Vector256.Shuffle() produces bad results in release mode #86432
    8.0.0
  • Convert not grace handling boundary values of integer types when converting from floating point representations #86439
  • JIT: Assertion failed '((tree->gtFlags & GTF_VAR_DEF) == 0) && (tree->GetLclNum() == lclNum) && tree->gtVNPair.BothDefined()' during 'VN based copy prop #84619
    8.0.0
  • System.PlatformNotSupportedException: Algorithm 'RC2' is not supported on this platform. #85019
    8.0.0
  • Cannot restore on s390x #77879
    8.0.0
  • .NET 6 Android, The certificate data cannot be read with the provided password, the password may be incorrect #86349
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Base64EncodeDecodeInPlaceTests #86336
  • Remove Roslyn-Reflection helper abstraction from System.Text.Json source generator #79533
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add body content to HttpRequestException #86095
  • Assertion failed 'assertion->op2.HasIconFlag()' #86398
    8.0.0
  • [BUG] .NET acts weirdly on wrapped native libraries #86224
  • Test failure tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.sh #86233
    8.0.0
  • Enable source-build pre-built detection #81468
  • .Net 6 System.Process.Start cannot launch a self contained .net core 2.2 web app #86368
  • Reduce unnecessary allocations in TLS handshake (windows) #68951
    8.0.0
  • tracing.runtimeeventsource times out with PGO enabled and R2R disabled #86253
    8.0.0
  • [MSVC] a mistake in valuenum.h #86372
    8.0.0
  • Test failure _Vector64_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.General._Vector64.Program.WidenInt64() #86234
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM Hosted app fails to run when Nuget Packages upgraded to 8.0.0-preview-4.23260.4 #86364

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix marking of saved assemblies #86474
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Allow overbudget for small methods #86473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Optimize constant i2/i4 shuffles in jiterpreter #86470
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Implement I2 and I4 shuffles in the jiterpreter #86469
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2183518 #86468
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Warn if StringMarshalling doesn't match base and warn if base interface cannot be generated #86467
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Allow using active host context in hostfxr_get_runtime_delegate #86460
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Rename a couple model specs for config binding generator #86459
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • FileConfigurationProvider.Dispose should dispose FileProvider when it owns it #86455
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Ensure that the shuffle zero mask copies all bits #86453
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Fix endless loop in illink analyzer #86449
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Refactor name convention #86446
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • remove [DebuggerDisplayAttribute] from ref assemblies #86443
    area-System.Xml
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some bugs in the test set 'System.Runtime.Tests' for loongarch64. #86435
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Stop using LocalizationResources within framework #86430
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Baseline a couple more JIT tests #86429
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make merged test wrappers single file friendly #86428
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove inconsistent comments in Convert.cs #86425
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add debugging attributes to System.Security.Claims types #86424
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Add an undocumented switch to allow controlling the preferred vector width emitted implicitly by the JIT #86457
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix scanning synchronized methods #86427
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fill out array bounds in metadata transform #86313
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #86359
    Servicing-approved
  • [6.0-staging] Update some Windows server helix queues for mono #86355
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, runtime-mono
  • Exclude System.* reference assemblies in ILCompiler.Build.Tasks #86423
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Switch RhConfig from TCHAR to char #86393
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable v128 and PackedSimd in the interpreter #85920
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Update jiterpreter documentation #86461
    area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Make host look for RID-specific assets via a known list by default #84100
    breaking-change, area-Host
  • Remove workaround for fixed Roslyn bug #86464
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Remove noisy assert from Task #86445
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Remove call to morph on hoisted trees #86450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize the CRC64 implementation #85221
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Clean various aspects of config binding generator up #86420
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix GCStress timeouts in JIT/jit64 #85040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Fix alignment problems with calls and simd types in unoptimized methods #86433
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Zip.Unix: don't hang when creating zip file from directory with named pipe. #85301
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • add pre-built detection #86151
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix issue with hoisting and copy prop interaction #85493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Set WasmEnableWebcil to true by default #86330
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix Base64 decoding regressions from whitespace handling #86396
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance
  • [browser] logging cleanup #86431
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Remove System.Reflection wrappers from the STJ source generator. #86334
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` indexing #85254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Fix assertprop assert for missing handle flag #86409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix deadlock in NativeRuntimeEventSourceTest #86370
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Disable DllImportSearchPathsTest and StartupHookTests on mobile #86269
    needs-area-label
  • [browser] Describe ES6 modules #86381
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Convert JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests to a merged test group #85847
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • avoid ProtocolToken allocations in TLS handshake #86163
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Make IDerivedTest.CallBaseInterfaceMethod_EnsureQiCalledOnce trim-friendly #86397
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement
  • Add natstepfilter to skip over object allocators #86418
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not assert RyuJIT if InitializeArray cannot be expanded #86373
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove extraneous VN code #86407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delay reg free for tbx_1reg #86292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add basic support for StringMarshalling in GeneratedComInterface #86404
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Move the GCC and CLR Tools Unit Tests legs to use the global build template #86411
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Isolating JITDbl2Ulng helper changes #86175
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add request metrics to System.Net.Http #85447
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • [draft][browser] threads experiment #86278
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #86358
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [WIP] Make the RefreshMemoryLimit API public #85549
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Enabling AOT wrappers for virtual delegates #85643
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Initial work to enable EventPipe in Linux #86226
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector128/256/512.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • enable TieredPGO by default #86225
    NO-MERGE, area-TieredCompilation-coreclr
  • SHA3 #84132
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Exploit unallocated zero page to remove null checks in jiterpreter #86403
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Read StartDiskNumber as uint32 #83923
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #81115
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Update System.CommandLine version #84229
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix async XsdValidatingReader to not use synchronious IO #84888
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Upgrade build to use .NET 8 Preview 4 SDK #86408
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable event pipe tests in NativeAOT CI run #86389
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Only call Free in unmanaged->managed stubs when ownership has been transfered to the callee #86415
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix mapping of redeclared type parameters #86353
    area-Tools-ILLink, needs-area-label
  • [mono][mini] Fix conversion from r4/r8 to native u #85964
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix receiving of 2nd register in struct #86144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth and PreferredVectorBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Generate jiterpreter feature detect modules dynamically #86401
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Stop setting HelixResultsDestinationDir #86413
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Dynamic heap count #86245
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use cinv instead of csel when possible #84926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update GetElement and ToScalar to lower IND, LCL_FLD, and LCL_VAR specially #86400
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add version info to NativeAOT apps #79623
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement compare native function #85965
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Start dynamic heap count work #84168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add ProcessStartInfo constructor that accepts IEnumerable<string> arguments #86346
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Exclude unused bundle files in AppleAppBuilder #86316
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] delete the rsGetRsvdReg() for LA64. #86319
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for types with parameterized ctors to config binder gen #86365
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Enable runtime tests on Interpreter #86375
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • Attempt to fix unfailing helix test run when testResults.xml are missing #86342
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] introduce sourcemaps #86152
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix warnings found with CA1861 Avoid constant arrays as arguments #86229
    area-Meta
  • Restore missing API from Extensions #85846
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    community-contribution, needs-area-label

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet publish command fails after updating to dotnet SDK 7.0.302 #32648
  • Build Issue with Latest SDK 7.0.302 #32637

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E]With .NET 8 preview 5 SDK installed, the help description for "--sc, --self-contained" option should be updated as the default is 'false' now if a runtime identifier is specified. #32549
  • dotnet nuget push doesn't push package to Nuget when running in GitHub Workflow #32631
  • Integrate `dotnet run` with `wasmtime` args #32621

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0.4xx] Add warning for optional workload EOL #32658
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Add warning for optional workload EOL #32657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #32645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update the help description for "--sc, --self-contained" option after the breaking change #32656
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • #24909 Add condition for System.NET.http to work for Multitargeting .NETFramework #32630
    untriaged

Updated

  • Update dependabot to run on 4xx #31837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers/CreateNewImage: don't change the user to root when ContainerUser is empty. #32594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.4xx] support correct property name and ensure compat with old name #32085
    Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers/Layer: trim x-bit based on filesystem permissions on Unix. #32606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Interceptors #7009
  • Champion: fixed-sized buffers #1314
    Working Set
  • Primary Constructors #2691
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Update inline-arrays.md #7208
  • Update primary-constructors.md based on recent LDM decisions #7207

Merged

  • Collection literals: add type inference #7171

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrectly flagged IDE0059 #68251
  • `global using` produces unnecessary TypeRef in output file #68250
  • Code Cleanup Hangs When Attempting To Fix CS1998 #68249
  • Feature 'Asset synchronization' is currently unavailable due to an internal error. #68246
  • MyJsonContext need implete GetTypeInfo #68245
  • Error performing rename: 'Unexpected false - line 20' #68244

Closed

  • Update Contributing.md to set more clear expectations #68209
  • Visual Studio 2022 (v17.6.0) seems to immediately cancel codefixes when clicking light bulbs #68254
  • Feature 'Solution Events' is currently unavailable due to an internal error. #68247
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33717.311 #68243

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix inconsistencies around MemberNames #68262
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add new (hopefully easier) telemetry mechanism #68261
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix infinite loop in highlight refs. #68259
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.4 #68258
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove unnecessary casts #68257
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cache evaluated parameters for public method symbols #68256
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expect mapped paths in InterceptsLocationAttribute #68242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add interceptors feature flag #68241
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Tweak infra swat DL #68263
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add feature to help people move to using primary constructors. #68147
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Change 17.6-vs-deps to 17.6 in PublishData.json #68229
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #68228
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Contributing.md #68220
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove all fields from SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbol in the common case. #68135
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #68255
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use net8 ref assemblies for inline array testing. #68252
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Disallow inline array operations in expression trees. #68222
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Enabled .NET remote host by default #68161
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #68264
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Mark 17.6 APIs as shipped #68221
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Bot rules for stale issues and PRs #67684
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reuse member names collection in decl tree across edits #67753
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move LongPath check to MSBuild target #68217
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rationalize how temporary directory works today #68226
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow parsing `ref readonly` modifier #68164
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Add support for ref returning methods and properties in `With` statement. #68203
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, untriaged
  • Add design for interceptors with nonzero arity #68218
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Accept-Language Header is not validated by RFC 9110 specification #48318
  • Identity does not validate 8 digit code when two factor authentication is used #48317
  • Perf regression: fortunes #48316
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, multiple_queries, multiple_queries #48315
  • Perf improvement: https, json #48314
  • Introduce new Tag Helpers to allow controlling output of head and body targeting ITagHelperComponents #48313
  • QuickGrid package should only install in .NET 8 or later projects #48312
  • Make built-in realtime feature in blazor ssr #48311
  • The different behaviors in Blazor WebAssembly after setting the DefaultLayout property of the AuthorizeRouteView in App.razor. #48310
  • The names of the metrics produced by the new meters do not seem clear #48309
  • .net 8 P4 Brotli compress task not functioning as in previous previews #48308
    Discussions
  • RequestDelegateGenerator fails to detect route pattern that uses a constant for its value #48307
    8.0-preview5
  • Encrypt secrets in dotnet user-secrets #48306
  • SignalR WebSocket Connectivity Issue in FireFox #48305
  • (WebSockets transport) There was an error with the transport #48303
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, https #48301
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, https, updates #48300
  • SecurityStampValidator forces sign out of TwoFactorRememberMeScheme, which throws exception when no sign-out authentication handler is registered #48299
    Backlog
  • Shadow Copy on IIS when new version of SDK is installed fails. #48296

Closed

  • Blazor preview 8.0.0-preview.4.23260.4 startup error #48298
  • Perf regression: json #48302
  • Allow creating Razor class libraries with `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Server.Circuits` namespace #48290
  • Identity cookie is not removed from browser after removing unwanted scheme #48297
  • SystemTextJsonOutputFormatter cannot handle multiple encodings #48286
    Backlog
  • XML request [FromBody] results in 415 error #48229
  • Exception: Correlation failed. Unknown location #48041
  • WithOpenApi adds Empty requestBody when parameter is of type string[] or StringValues #47644
    7.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove static analysis for route parameter in RDG #48320
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Add a test confirming that X509Certificate is trimmed #48295
    needs-area-label, area-hosting
  • Enable Blazor Server and WebAssembly components to run in the same document #48294
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Avoid delegate shuffle thunks in StringUtilities #48234
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5
  • Skip counter measurement when start listening while processing #48045
    area-runtime, area-signalr, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • [Blazor] Add new Blazor Web Template #48285
    area-mvc
  • Change incorrect usage of ArgumentNullException #48243
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Source generator to create the discovery information at compile time. #48284
    area-blazor
  • Add debug output to HttpContext and friends #48293
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor] Update discovery APIs and automatically configure the endpoints based on the discovered RenderModes #48283
    area-blazor
  • Replace ISystemClock with TimeProvider in Kestrel #48081
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, 8.0-preview5
  • Update JSInProcessObjectReference.cs #48287
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Update SDK #48252
    area-infrastructure
  • http.sys; add opt-in support for kernel-mode response buffering #47776
    area-runtime, servers-httpsys, area-perf, pending-ci-rerun
  • Bump selenium-standalone to 8.3.0 - allow E2E testing on osx-arm64 #48288
    needs-area-label
  • Pass through arbitrary attributes to QuickGrid #48268
    area-blazor, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Diagnostics Repo Engineering Summary #3884

Closed

  • Add Ubuntu 20.04 to the diagnostics repo test matrix #1131
    8.0.0
  • Update the CentOS, cross-build and alpine docker images with clang/lldb 9.0 and fix resulting problems #607
    Future

PullRequests

Updated

  • Test code to chase down an OSX failure #3880
    DO NOT MERGE
  • Perfmaps IPC changes for DiagnosticClient #3873
    Microsoft.Diagnostics.NETCore.Client, 8.0.0
  • Enhancements to NETCore.Client and dotnet-dump around ports and logging #3877

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Scroll to new view without tabs #15171
  • MAUI ios will no longer build on windows when using Xamarin.Firebase.iOS.CloudMessaging #15170
  • Using ".." in route definition doesn't remove last navigated page(s) from nav stack #15166
  • iOS - Basic collection view elements don't render properly. #15164
  • Grid and ScrollView don't play well together [iOS, Regression] #15163
  • Border StrokeThickness="0" not working when parent is Grid #15162
  • The foreground stop running when application is not in foreground #15161
  • [iOS] MAUI ScrollView is not scrollable when Keyboard hides content #15159
  • Android EmptyView in CollectionView weird resizine after screen rotation #15158
  • Windows Cannot click on EmptyView #15157
  • Flyout title has different MaxLine count on different platforms #15156
  • Windows Flyout Title has maxLines 2 when app is not in full screen and only one when app is in full screen #15155
  • iOS Flyout title is not broken over multiple lines when you rotate your screen #15154
  • iOS - Can't scroll to the last item in Flyout #15153
  • Windows EmptyView different vertical/horizontal options when Template/View used #15152
  • PathF.Bounds returns too big boxes #15151
  • Picker is empty #15150
  • MauiHybrid <datalist> element no longer working #15149
  • CollectionView in VerticalStackLayout different behavior on different platforms #15148
  • Using DataTemplate breaks ObservableCollection binding #15147
  • Defining built-in visual states throws exception #15146

Closed

  • [iOS] CollectionView takes up huge vertical space #9135
    .NET 8 Planning
  • RightToLeft does not work when StackLayout has a child with EndAndExpand #8488
  • ListView in MacCatalyst is slow and render incorrectly when scroll back / up #11287
    Backlog
  • CollectionView's VerticalOptions are not working as intended on iOS. #14966
    Backlog
  • Filepicker doesn't work in sandbox mode (MacCatalyst) #15129
    Backlog
  • Shell Flyout Issue (App ThemeBinding wont update icon) #8334
    Backlog
  • Maui Android OnBackPressed has wrong return type #7567
  • Views always returning -1 as Width #15046
  • [Windows] How to completely hide the TitleBar? #15142
  • Incorrect image orientation using MediaPicker CapturePhoto on iOS #9535
    Backlog
  • [regression/7.0.86] On iOS grid rows that are set to star display as auto when view is added later that spans all rows and columns #15079
    .NET 7 + Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Small fixes for uitest project location and install #15172
  • Default ANDROID_SDK_ROOT if not set #15169
  • Use Frame command to recalc span bounds #15168

Merged

  • Make CollectionView on iOS measure to content size #14951
    area/collectionview 📃, backport/suggested
  • Remove incorrect call to `DisconnectHandler` #15036
  • [workload] add metadata about .NET 6 EOL #15117
    area/setup 🪄
  • [Android] Don't dispose connectivity listeners #15145
  • Wait for root page to load before processing modal #15037
  • Adjust index path for cell reuseid in carouselview #15140
  • [iOS] Normalize the orientation from MediaPicker photos #14568
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞

Updated

  • Don't retain parameters not passed as query string parameters #14965
    t/breaking 💥, p/1, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Android gallery fixes #15118
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Fix contentview rtl #15114
    area/layout 🔲
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Use Platform* Graphics APIs to match with the rest of the platforms #12818
    t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Account for padding when expanding * rows/columns to new sizes #15143
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Android] Fix NullReferenceException on WebAuthenticatorIntermediateActivity #15052
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Move some controls to use ModifyMapping #15058
  • Update CODEOWNERS #15008
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, partner/tizen

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF7 override Identity nullable columns. #30929
  • New Entity Id being set to 0 results in FK Violation #30928
  • Translate DegreesToRadians #30926
  • Most cases of projecting a primitive collection don't work #30922
  • Parameter for collection of enum values contains ints even when correlated column has strings #30921

Closed

  • List is not saving to database #30918
  • 8.0.0-preview.4.23259.3: System.MissingMethodException: 'Method not found: 'Void CoreTypeMappingParameters..ctor()'.' #30923
  • Using "nvarchar" for explicit store type of primitive collection throws #30919
    8.0.0
  • Dictionary<string,string> is not support as Json Columns #30917

PullRequests

Created

  • Parse simple default constraint literals when scaffolding #30927
  • SQLite: Translate Math.Sign #30925

Merged

  • Add tests to ensure sentinels for flags enums are code-genned correctly #30924
  • Better detection of string store types on primitive collections #30920
